title: Smart India Hackathon
desc: Developed UI using Angular-Ionic with Nebular UI Kit and server-client integration using MERN Stack.

title: Recognition from KSCST
desc: Our Final Year Project, Open Resource Control and Surveillance Toolkit (ORCS), has received recognition from Karnataka State Council for Science and Technology (KSCST), Indian Institute of Science, for its innovative and creative ideas.

title: National Level Robotics
desc: Finalist of 'Techfest' organized by IIT Bombay and 'Quark' organized by 'BITS Goa'.

title: AVALANCHE Hackathon
desc: Bagged 1st price in Avalance College level hackathon.
